title: "Study analyzes effects of a calorie-restricted diet on the hippocampus in old rats"
excerpt: "A study coordinated by the Institute of Neurosciences of the UAB (INc-UAB) analyzes in old rats the effects of a calorie-restricted diet on the hippocampus, a brain structure that is critical in learning and memory processes."
